name: Neon Odyssey (PickleTreeStudios)
description:
NEON ODYSSEY is a upgrade based driving game. Upgrade your car to reach the neon city!

  • Make money from each trip to spend on upgrades
  • Avoid obstacles!
  • Hit ramps and boost pads for further highscores!
  • Endless mode coming soon!

//Game is still a WIP. Please feel free to leave constructive feedback!
